### **Development Of Science 2025 / 9     Issue 9. Volume 1.**
#### [TEST NATIJALARINI TAHLIL QILISHDA TASNIFLASH ALGORITMLARINING SAMARADORLIGI](https://devos.uz/files/1710.pdf)
Abdunasimov. S. S.
---
##### Annotatsiya
Ushbu maqolada test natijalarini tahlil qilish jarayonida mashinali o‘qitishning tasniflash algoritmlari qo‘llanilishi o‘rganildi. An’anaviy baholash usullari sub’ektivlik va xatolarga moyil bo‘lib, katta hajmdagi ma’lumotlar bilan samarali ishlay olmaydi. Tasniflash algoritmlaridan foydalanish esa test natijalarini ob’ektiv va tezkor baholash imkonini beradi. Maqolada qaror daraxtlari, tasodifiy o‘rmonlar, K-NN, Naive Bayes va neyron tarmoqlar samaradorligi taqqoslandi.
---
##### Adabiyotlar
1.  Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R., Friedman, J. (2009). The Elements of Statistical Learning. Springer.
2.  James, G., Witten, D., Hastie, T., Tibshirani, R. (2013). An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R. Springer.
3.  Goodfellow, I., Bengio, Y., Courville, A. (2016). Deep Learning. MIT Press.
4.  Bishop, C. (2006). Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning. Springer.
5.  Chen, T., & Guestrin, C. (2016). XGBoost: A Scalable Tree Boosting System. Proceedings of the 22nd ACM SIGKDD, 785–794.
6.  Breiman, L. (2001). Random Forests. Machine Learning, 45(1), 5–32.
7.  Cover, T., & Hart, P. (1967). Nearest Neighbor Pattern Classification. IEEE Transactions on Information Theory, 13(1), 21–27.
8.  Domingos, P., & Pazzani, M. (1997). On the Optimality of the Simple Bayesian Classifier under Zero-One Loss. Machine Learning, 29(2), 103–130.
9.  Kumar, V., & Singh, R. (2021). Application of Machine Learning Algorithms in Student Performance Prediction. International Journal of Computer Applications, 174(21), 1–6.
10.  Zhou, Z-H. (2021). Ensemble Methods: Foundations and Algorithms. Chapman and Hall/CRC.
